returns.initialized_: bool True if the contract is initialized, false otherwise.

returns.pendingOwner_: The address of the pending owner.*

params._newOwner: address that is set as the pending new owner

acceptOwnership().notice: Transfer the ownership to the new pending ownercaller must be the pending owneremits a {AuthEvent.OwnershipTransferred} event

initialized().notice: Check if the contract is initialized

owner().notice: Get the address of the owner

pendingOwner().notice: Get the address of pending owner

transferOwnership(address).notice: Initiate ownership transfer to a new addresscaller must be the current contract ownerthe new owner cannot be address(0)emits a {AuthEvent.PendingOwnershipTransfer} event
